name: EsportsNext Podcast
description: The EsportsNext Podcast showcases prominent industry leaders and professionals from the EsportsNext conference, the annual event hosted by the Esports Trade Association. This conference is a key networking hub for the esports industry. Tune in with hosts John Davidson and Megan Van Petten as they engage with experts who share their insights and experiences in the world of esports.
